attributes.action: Allow the Red Arrows to do fly pass at the 2012 Oympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political correctness gone mad again. I am proud to British and all Britishness stands for. The Red Arrows are the most brilliant excellence of co-ordination aeronautically I have seen and would be spectacular at the opening of the Olympics!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
